known_issues: Error in equipment list: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'replace')

existing_features.title: Fix the 'Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'replace')' error occurring in the equipment list view by adding null/undefined checks before any replace() method calls on equipment data fields

Add defensive null/undefined handling in EquipmentListPage.tsx for all equipment fields that may be used in string operations, particularly focusing on fields passed to search, filter, or display logic

projectName: Fix equipment list undefined error in replace call
